meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent1: She widely shared her toys with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The news of the party spread widely among the students.
meanings.sent3: The cat widely stretched out on the sunny windowsill.
meanings.sent4: His kindness widely bloomed in the hearts of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room widely filled the air.

meanings.definition: Over a large area or distance
meanings.sent1: The forest fire spread widely, causing damage to many trees.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed widely through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The kite flew widely in the open field, dancing with the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed widely across the empty street.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone widely in the dark night sky.

meanings.definition: By a large number of people or in many places
meanings.sent1: The new song was widely loved by music fans everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The message was widely spread through social media.
meanings.sent3: The rumor of the talking dog spread widely, amusing the town.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting was widely recognized in the art community.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh bread baking widely wafted through the neighborhood.
